description: zinc plate for printing attached to wooden block, with metal eye at top for hanging; image of couple in LRC, with woman in hooded cloak and man in top hat and overcoat with walking stick, on a narrow street at night, surrounded by ghostly figures and fantastic people; night sky with crescent moon, URC, with stars; smoke from chimney in ULQ
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Bob Hogan, Albuquerque, NM
signed: at left edge, near LLC, in reverse, in relief: [R / H]
title: Printing plate for image of couple on night street surrounded by ghouls
